summary: The video shows a woman giving a tour of a luxurious room at Estelle Manor, highlighting various amenities provided for guests, including dog-friendly features, snacks, drinks, toiletries, and a mini bar. She mentions the cost of the room and her upgrade due to having a dog. The room includes a bedroom, TV, and wardrobe space.
keywords: Estelle Manor, room tour, luxury, amenities, dog-friendly, snacks, drinks, toiletries, mini bar, bedroom, TV, wardrobe, upgrade, cost
